We may use this information to more effectively engage with you and improve our site.

Click will store and process the Personal Information in a manner consistent with industry security standards.
Clicks will retain personal information for the extent necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and to provide products and services to our customers.

Click uses trusted subprocessors with the delivery of our Products (Services).
These subprocessors have access to Personal Information to provide the Services.

Additionally, we may retain Personal Information as necessary to comply with legal obligations or resolve disputes, or as otherwise justified by a legitimate interest of Click, subject to applicable laws.
